casebody.data:
In re NATALIE S. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 15, 2016.

Michael S. Taylor, Hartford, and Marina L. Green, in support of the petition.

Benjamin Zivyon, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

*288The petition by the respondent mother for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 604, 139 A.3d 824 (2016), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court correctly determine that continuing reunification efforts for the respondent mother were not required because temporary guardianship had been placed with the father?"

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
